FLOW.COMMENT: Set errorInfo fields (set servicesName only here in this flow )

MAP.NAME: PARENT
MAP.COMMENT: Set global values for all <errorInfo> fields here

BRANCH.COMMENT: LDH Step 1 (The output of this branch will be a boundnode containing the contents of your document)

INVOKE.COMMENT: ** Set FULLY QUALIFIED NAMESPACE of DOC TYPE here

Values.value: Enter the FULLY QUALIFIED NAMESPACE of the corresponding DOCUMENT TYPE here

INVOKE.NAME: $null
INVOKE.COMMENT: Convert bizdoc to a webMethods document.
Build Error Message and Send it for Reporting

EXIT.COMMENT: Exit on error if you need to write to the webMethods server log in addition to the local repository
